title: Queen Amira!
text:
I believe her name was Amira at the front desk. She was a pleasure to deal with and found me the most fantastic room. I asked if there was a room with a view of the Chrysler Center (as it is my favorite building in the city). She set me up in a multi-room suite , with an outdoor balcony! I couldn't have been happier!
While this hotel is a little worn around the edges, the location, staff and room size more than make up for it.
A great find in the city. I only wish I had the opportunity to stay there more than one day.
I hope management read this review so Amira can get the recognition she deserves....she definitely made my stay a memorable one and I will recommend this hotel to anyone.
